definitions.title: vb. hoe
definitions.body: (NH id.; so Ar. (in Syria) 9adara, ma9oduwr pick, hoe, Cuche (m9dwr also Dozy:ii. 101 b); cf. Fl:Kl. Schr. ii. 628);—

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[לאׁ יֵעָדֵר]] Is 5:6 it (the vineyard) shall not be hoed (‖[[יִזׇּמֵר]]); 3 mpl. [[כַּמַּעְדֵּר יֵעָדֵרָוּן]] Is 7:25 which used to be hoed with the hoe (subj. [[הֶהָרִים]]).
